about.title: DEVELOPMENT_PHILOSOPHY
about.p1_strong: Code is only as good as the problem it solves.
about.p1: I build software that scales. Whether you're a growing startup or an enterprise looking to modernize, I deliver clean, maintainable solutions that grow with your business. I focus on creating systems that are fast, reliable, and built to last.
about.p2: My expertise spans full-stack development and process automation. I use AI-powered development techniques to accelerate delivery without compromising quality. For enterprises seeking custom solutions from scratch, I architect and build complete backends and frontends. For teams needing automation, I leverage tools like n8n to streamline operations and reduce manual work.
certs: Vue School - Certified Senior Angular Developer
